name: Liam Murphy
routine: Liam goes to bed at around 10:30pm and wakes up at 6am to take his dog for a run.
occupation: Liam is a secondary school teacher, teaching history. He works from 8am to 4pm and occasionally tutors in the evenings.
thoughts: He's been excitedly setting up a new interactive history exhibit for his students, with the launch happening on February 4th, 2024.
lifestyle: Liam opts for a hearty Irish diet with an appreciation for stews and bread. He enjoys woodworking in his shed as a form of relaxation and often experiments with crafting traditional furniture. His home reflects a rustic and cozy décor theme.

name: Sinead Byrne
routine: Sinead typically sleeps at 10pm and wakes up at 6am, fitting in a quick yoga session before work.
occupation: Sinead is a primary school teacher in Ireland with working hours from 8:30 am to 3:30 pm.
thoughts: She's been planning a new outdoor learning program for her students and is excited to propose it at the staff meeting on 2nd February 2024.
lifestyle: Sinead favors wholesome, organic meals, enjoys weekend hikes, and has her living space filled with plants and natural light.

name: Aleksey Chernov
routine: Aleksey Chernov sleeps at 12am and wakes at 7am to walk his dog.
occupation: Aleksey is a computer security analyst who works a standard 9 am to 5 pm day.
thoughts: He is anxious about a server breach his company faced and has been working extra hours since February 1st, 2024, to resolve the situation.
lifestyle: He prefers hearty Russian meals, relaxes by ice fishing on weekends, and has a functional and straightforward home setup.
